dataIdInfo.idPurp: Administrative tasks needed to configure a state template for the NRCS determination tools.
dataIdInfo.idAbs: The steps in this task are for use by NRCS state tool administrators to create state-level templates in support of determinations.

Consts.useLimit: These steps are intended for use only with the NRCS determination tools and based on the Blank Template provided with the determination tool installation files.
